TopicTitle: MM config to decrease all antennas consumption on science transmission

Articles.Content:
Hey everyone,

 

I'd like to come up with a kind off FINAL patch, so that all data transmitters consumme much less EC when transmiting science... I'm so used to Kerbalism/RP-1, and that just doesn't make sense to me that a small antenna requires that much ec...

Anyway, that's my wish, but it's beyond my DIY abitlies with Module Manager, so I'm asking to the Kraken Goddess and the community !

Thanks for your help
